Verses.34: "You brood of vipers! How can you, being evil, express anything good? For the mouth speaks from the fullness of the heart.
Verses.35: The good person brings good things out of their deposits of good. The evil person brings evil out of their deposits of evil.
Verses.36: Now, I tell you, on the day of judgment, people will give account for every careless word they speak.
Verses.37: For by your words you will be justified, and by your words you will be condemned."
Verses.46: While Jesus was still speaking to the crowds His mother and brothers were standing outside. They were wanting to speak to Him.
Verses.47: Someone said to Him, "Look, Your mother and brothers are standing outside. They want to speak to You."
Verses.48: But Jesus responded to them and said, "Who is My mother, and who are My brothers?"
Verses.49: Then he stretched out His hand towards His disciples. He said, "Here, My mother, and My brothers.
Verses.50: For whoever does the will of My Father, who is in heaven, is my brother, sister, and mother."

Footnotes.47: Some Greek manuscripts do not include verse 47.

Changes: 2023-07-19 - Paul Prins: First translation of chapter 12:34-37, 46-50
